about_the_game:
Embark on an epic interstellar journey as the universe teeters on the brink of collapse. Brace yourself as interstellar nomads race against time to return home before their worlds are torn apart. Will you be the savior who guides them to safety?

Immerse yourself in a thrilling game of survival, facing relentless onslaughts round after round. Harness the power of intergalactic swords, master the art of projectile warfare, and defy the chaos by reflecting galaxies and stars back to their origins.

Key Features to Ignite Your Adventure:

Unleash your skills across an expansive campaign of 60 heart-pounding missions. Prepare for escalating durations and mounting challenges with each new mission.
Embrace the unknown with our Random Game mode, where unexpected encounters await in the imploding 'verse.

Unleash Your Power with Simplistic Controls:

Dive right into the action with easy-to-use mouse controls. A massive sword accompanies each nomad and their home, precisely aligned with your mouse cursor's every move.
Take control of the battlefield: Left Mouse Button reflects hazards near any sword, safeguarding your nomads. Right Mouse Button launches powerful projectiles from each sword, aimed precisely at your mouse cursor. Obliterate threats that dare approach your swords.

Confront Diverse Hazards:

Conquer a multitude of hazard types, each demanding a unique strategy to overcome. Some hazards relentlessly target your home, while others ambush nomads from all directions. Prepare for a thrilling blend of tile-based challenges and bullet hell mechanics.
Brace yourself for intense boss rounds that push your skills to the limit. Experience an exhilarating fusion of mechanics or encounter entirely new challenges, designed to test your mettle.
Join the interstellar nomads in their fight for survival and secure their triumphant return home. The fate of entire civilizations rests in your hands. Will you rise to the challenge?
